actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the 5-percent threshold applicable to the deduction for medical expenses to 3 percent.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the threshold amount applicable to the allowance of the deduction for medical expenses from five percent to three percent of adjusted gross income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the 5-percent threshold applicable to the deduction for medical expenses to 3 percent.
